trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Oxnard
There were no other sightings in Oxnard on or around August 19th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas inside the house, went outside as the sun was starting to set to have a cigarette. As I look up I see a red flash streak the sky. This was not a shooting star I said to myself. So as I look up, I then see (2) very bright objects in the sky to the left of where I saw the red streak. I noticed they were sitting very low and very still..I watched it straight for 20 minutes with some recording here and there..then 1 light remained as I stayed and observed for a little over 2 hours and the object was still there until I decided to go inside the house to search the internet to see if there was any talk of our visitor...at first I thought this could either be a orbiting satellite (then I said no, because it was REALLY low), a very bright star (looked too big for a star, and if im not mistaken, I could have sworn the object would rotate colors)...my general feeling after witnessing a once in a lifetime experience was, is the world gonna end? and if it were in fact a UFO, wouldn't airspace controllers be the first to extract a team to access and observe the situation in the skies. lots of theories...
Summary: Bright light that interchanged colors hovered for hours then disappeared.
